ygData.subject: Re: Practicing Wind with Mino Horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If that were the case, then I wouldn t be getting the wind skill improvements I *have* gotten via CCC.. Talies the Wanderer Check out the EverQuesting
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:57 PM 9/3/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Jukeboxie the Bard" <jukeboxie@...>
>
>
>Have you been using a minotaur horn, or a flute, hon? When I first hit 16, I
>doubled up on swimming and wind by equipping my wooden flute, jumping in the
>water at the mage guilde in Freeport, firing up Tarew's and going about my
>daily life for a few hours. Got to 81 or so.
>
>The minotaur horn doesn't show the flute animation, but I'd swear it doesn't
>practice wind, either. I tried practicing in the pond in Halas with a horn,
>when afk for a good bit, and saw zero improvement.
>
>What I'm getting at here is this: does the minotaur horn actually use the
>Wind skill? From what I've observed, it doesn't seem to.

If that were the case, then I wouldn't be getting the wind skill
improvements I *have* gotten via CCC..
Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
